member.name: T:Yandex.Maps.Map
member.summary: Map control. Map can be scrolled and zoomed. Zoom level can be set with pinch or by calling , methods or by setting property value. Is a content control. You can turn road traffic display on or off by setting property value. You can monitor the the road traffic level number by subscribing to the event. It's up to you how this number it is displayed.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class

member.summary: Represents the property for enabling road traffic display.

member.summary: Indicates location service for Map control instance is used. Location service is used by method and to display user location mark on a map. If false, user location mark is not visible on a map.

member.summary: Represents the property for enabling location service for Map control instance. Location service is used by method and to display user location mark on a map.

member.name: M:Yandex.Maps.MapBase.EnsureControlIsVisible(System.Windows.UIElement)
member.summary: Make map child control visible by scrolling and zooming the map. If the is specified, then map is scrolled to have given point displayed inside the viewport. If the is specified, then map is scrolled and zoomed to make entire object's rectangle visible in the viewport.

member.summary: Get the value of given desired property from the given control or from the content of that control.
member.param: The optional child object of a given dependencyObject. If it is null then try to determine it as VisualTree child. Is used to get rid of repeating VisualTree checks.
member.returns: The value of the dependency property from the child. If child is or then its content is checked for the value.
